question:
With reference to the government commissioning a study on anti-biotic resistance in Ganga, consider the following statements:
  1. The study will look at the microbial diversity along the entire stretch of the river.
  2. Some of the highest antibiotic resistance rates in common infectious bacteria occur in India.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: The study is commissioned by the government to assess the microbial strains’ diversity in the entire 2,500km stretch of the river. This is the first time such a study is covering the entire river. It is a 9.3 crore INR study that will involve multiple institutes like Nagpur’s NEERI as well as start-ups like Phixgen. Statement 2 is correct: A study published in 2017 showed that India has some of the highest rates of anti-biotic resistance in common infectious bacteria. This means that even the common infections would become difficult to treat with the current set of anti-biotics if the strains spread.
